meanings.definition: Plan and direct (an ingenious and complex scheme or enterprise)
meanings.sent1: She enjoys masterminding elaborate surprises for her friends.
meanings.sent2: The criminal was arrested for masterminding a bank heist.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be masterminding an escape plan from the house.
meanings.sent4: The coach was masterminding the team's victory strategy.
meanings.sent5: The scientist was masterminding a groundbreaking experiment.

meanings.definition: The action of planning and directing (an ingenious and complex scheme or enterprise)
meanings.sent1: His masterminding of the project led to its success.
meanings.sent2: The masterminding of the heist was carefully orchestrated.
meanings.sent3: The masterminding of the surprise party was kept secret until the end.
meanings.sent4: Her masterminding of the event impressed everyone in the company.
meanings.sent5: The masterminding of the mission required great attention to detail.
